title: Au Lac - DTLA
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion
description: From the long established Au Lac in Fountain Valley springs its 2nd and more upscale location in downtown Los Angeles. Opened Dec 2014 across the street from Disney Concert Hall. Features a menu of mostly raw cuisine along with a few cooked vegan dishes. Full bar and upscale lounge atmosphere at moderate prices. Parking lot entrance is around the back of the plaza, or park on street.
